code: import React,{useState}from"react";import"./App.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[cart,setCart]=useState([]);const products=[{id:1,name:"Milk",price:2.5},{id:2,name:"Curd",price:1.5},{id:3,name:"Rice",price:5.0}];const addToCart=product=>{setCart([...cart,product]);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"E-commerce Shop"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"product-list",children:products.map(product=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Price: $",product.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>addToCart(product),children:"Add to Cart"})]},product.id))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["Cart: ",cart.length," items"]})]});}export default App;
